\Aura\Sql

\Aura\SqlQuery

Namespaces

Mysql
Pgsql
Sqlite

Traits

FlagsTrait A trait for adding query flags (such as DISTINCT in SELECT).
LimitTrait A trait for adding LIMIT.
OffsetTrait A trait for adding LIMIT.
OrderByTrait A trait for adding ORDER BY.
ReturningTrait A trait for adding RETURNING.
ValuesTrait A trait for adding column value placeholders and setting values directly.
WhereTrait A trait for adding WHERE conditions.

Classes

AbstractQuery Abstract query object for Select, Insert, Update, and Delete.
Delete An object for DELETE queries.
Factory Creates query statement objects.
Insert An object for INSERT queries.
Select An object for SELECT queries.
Update An object for UPDATE queries.
